about_the_game:
Ghoul Yeah Bunny is a horror game with a strong narative story. Players must face a dark atmosphere, fun puzzles and consume rabbits. Your rabbit lantern is your only weapon against the cunning Ghoul. You must consume bunnies, shoot the Ghoul, solve puzzles and find your Adem. We advice you to be silent and safe. If you don't listen this wise advice, Ghoul will make you listen.



Solve the mystery of the cursed Bunny Island by gathering diary pieces around the island. Consume the souls of the rabbits in the Tavshanzade Island. Use your collected bunny souls carefully. You will need them...



You must find and save Adem; nothing else matters. Adem is yours. But who is Adem? Who are you? Why are you on this island? Discover the dark story behind the Tavshanzade Island. Solve the mysteries and witness a cunning story of the rise and fall of the magnificen Tavshanzade Family.



The only human in the island is you. However, you are not alone... Ghoul is also libing on the island and he will not rest until you are consumed. You must be carefull: Do not make noise. If you do, you must run like a rabbit and hide. Or... you can enjoy being the next meal for the Ghoul of the Bunny Island.

Grab your ancient and mighty rabbit lantern. Challenge the darkness and claim what is yours. Do you have what it takes? Will you survive the Tavshanzade Island and overcome the your Ghoul?

name: Ghoul Yeah Bunny Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ghoul Yeah Bunny is a horror game with a mystery story. Players must face a dark atmosphere, fun puzzles and consume rabbits. Your rabbit lantern is your only weapon against the cunning Ghoul. You must consume bunnies, shoot the Ghoul, solve puzzles and stay quiet. Don't be Ghoul Food.
